official_title: A bill to provide financial assistance for the restoration and reconstruction of Fort Abraham Lincoln in the State of North Dakota.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with North Dakota to provide financial assistance for the restoration of Fort Abraham Lincoln in Fort Lincoln State Park.

titles.title: A bill to provide financial assistance for the restoration and reconstruction of Fort Abraham Lincoln in the State of North Dakota.
